item.title: ShadowKV: KV Cache in Shadows for High-Throughput Long-Context LLM Inference
item.description: SHADOWKV boosts long-context LLM inference throughput by up to 3.04x by cleverly caching low-rank keys on the GPU and offloading value caches to the CPU, minimizing latency while maintaining accuracy.
